```{r opts, include = FALSE}
cache_path <- "/share/files/HIPC/IS2/@files/cache/prevax"
if (!dir.exists(cache_path)) dir.create(cache_path)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache.path = file.path(cache_path, "report_cache/"),
                      cache = TRUE)
```
```{r knit-child, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, cache = TRUE}
params <- list(
  dataDir = "/share/files/HIPC/IS2/@files/data",
  dataCacheDir = cache_path,
  cache = FALSE
)
res <- knitr::knit_child(
  system.file("manuscript_figures/pre_vaccination_manuscript_figures.Rmd",
              package = "ImmuneSignatures2"),
  envir = parent.frame(),
  quiet = TRUE
)
```
```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
cat(res)
```
